meanings.definition: A person who acts foolishly or stupidly.
meanings.sent1: That damfool always makes silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a damfool and listen to bad advice.
meanings.sent3: The damfool thought it was a good idea to wear socks with sandals.
meanings.sent4: His reckless driving made him look like a damfool on the road.
meanings.sent5: Being a damfool in front of everyone was embarrassing.

meanings.sent1: Her constant damfoolery annoyed everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: Running around in circles is just pure damfool.
meanings.sent3: The damfoolery of trying to fit a square peg into a round hole was evident.
meanings.sent4: His damfoolery in spending all his money on useless things left him broke.
meanings.sent5: The damfoolery of ignoring safety warnings led to a disaster.
